en: These things have I spoken unto you, that ye should not be caused to stumble.
hmr: “Sukthlûka in um nawna dingin hieng thu hi in kuomah ka hril ta hi.

en: They shall put you out of the synagogues: yea, the hour cometh, that whosoever killeth you shall think that he offereth service unto God.
hmr: Inkhâwmna inahai inhnawngtir an ti cheu a, anih, tûkhawm a sukhlum dinghai po cheuin Pathien chungah thilṭha thawin inhrieng an tih, chuong ang hun chu a tlung ding a nih.

en: And these things will they do, because they have not known the Father, nor me.
hmr: Chuong thil chu thâwng an tih, Pa le kei an mi hriet naw leiin.

en: But these things have I spoken unto you, that when their hour is come, ye may remember them, how that I told you. And these things I said not unto you from the beginning, because I was with you.
hmr: Hieng thu hi in kuomah ka hril ta hi, a hun chu a hung tlung pha, ka hril ta cheu ti in hriet nâwkna dingin. Hieng thil hi a tîra inthawk ka la hril naw hrim cheu a nih, in kuoma ka la um leiin.

en: But now I go unto him that sent me; and none of you asketh me, Whither goest thou?
hmr: Tu ruok hin chu a mi tirtu kuomah ka fe ding a nih, nangni rawi tukhawmin, ‘Khâwlai am i fe ding?’ tiin in mîn dawn si nawh.

en: But because I have spoken these things unto you, sorrow hath filled your heart.
hmr: Hieng thu hi in kuomah ka hril leiin in lungril chu lungngaiin a sip ṭeu lem tah a.

en: Nevertheless I tell you the truth: It is expedient for you that I go away; for if I go not away, the Comforter will not come unto you; but if I go, I will send him unto you.
hmr: “Nisienlakhawm, thu indiktak ka hril cheu hi, ka fe in ta dingin a ṭha; ka fe naw chun Thlamuongtu chu in kuomah a hung naw ding a ni sih a; kei ka fe ruok chun in kuomah hung tir ka tih.

en: And he, when he is come, will convict the world in respect of sin, and of righteousness, and of judgment:
hmr: Ama chu a hung tlung chun suol thua dâm, fel thua dâm, rorêl thua dâm khawvêl an thiemnaw inhriettir a tih;

en: of sin, because they believe not on me;
hmr: suol thua dâm thiemnaw chang an tih, kei an mi ring naw leiin,

en: of righteousness, because I go to the Father, and ye behold me no more;
hmr: fel thua dâm thiemnaw chang an tih, Pa kuomah ka fe ding a na, nangnîn in mi hmu nâwk ta naw ding lei hin;

en: of judgment, because the prince of this world hath been judged.
hmr: rorêl thua dâm thiemnaw chang an tih, hi khawvêl lal hi inthiemloa a tlûk ta leiin.

en: I have yet many things to say unto you, but ye cannot bear them now.
hmr: “In kuomah thu hril ding tamtak ka la nei ta rawp a; nisienlakhawm, tuhin chu tlin hri naw ti niu.

en: Howbeit when he, the Spirit of truth, is come, he shall guide you into all the truth: for he shall not speak from himself; but what things soever he shall hear, these shall he speak: and he shall declare unto you the things that are to come.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, ama Thlarau indiktak chu a hung tlung pha chun, thutak po poa chun ṭhuoi lût a ti cheu a, ama phuok fâwmin thu a hril âwm si nawh a, thu a idawng taphawt chu hril lem a tih; thil hung tlung dinghai khawm inhriettir a ti cheu.

en: He shall glorify me: for he shall take of mine, and shall declare it unto you.
hmr: Ama chun kei mi chawimawi a tih, ka taa mi lâng a ta, in kuomah ân hriettir ding cheu a ni sih a.

en: All things whatsoever the Father hath are mine: therefore said I, that he taketh of mine, and shall declare it unto you.
hmr: Pain thil a nei po po ka ta a nih; chuleiin, ‘ka taa mi lâng a ta, in kuomah inhriettir a ti cheu,’ ka ti hi.

en: A little while, and ye behold me no more; and again a little while, and ye shall see me.
hmr: “Sâwt nawtêah nangnîn kei mi hmu naw ti niu a, sâwt nawtêa bawk nangnîn kei mi hmu nâwk in tih,” a ta.

en: Some of his disciples therefore said one to another, What is this that he saith unto us, A little while, and ye behold me not; and again a little while, and ye shall see me: and, Because I go to the Father?
hmr: Chun, a închûktirhai ṭhenkhat- in, “Ei kuoma a thu hril hi ieng am a na? ‘Sâwt nawtêah nangnîn kei mi hmu naw ti niu a, sâwt nawtêa bawk nangnîn kei mi hmu nâwk in tih,’ a ti le, ‘Pa kuoma ka fe ding leiin,’ a ti hi,” an in tih a.

en: They said therefore, What is this that he saith, A little while? We know not what he saith.
hmr: Chun, anni ma chun, “Hi hi ieng am a na? ‘Sâwt nawtê,’ a ti hi. A thu hril hi a ngaina ei hriet nawh,” an ta.

en: Jesus perceived that they were desirous to ask him, and he said unto them, Do ye inquire among yourselves concerning this, that I said, A little while, and ye behold me not, and again a little while, and ye shall see me?
hmr: Chun, ama indawn an nuom ti Isûn a hriet a, an kuomah, “ ‘Sâwt nawtêah nangnîn kei mi hmu naw ti niu, sâwt nawtêa bawk nangnîn kei mi hmu nâwk in tih,’ tia hi ka thu hril hi in indawn maw?

en: Verily, verily, I say unto you, that ye shall weep and lament, but the world shall rejoice: ye shall be sorrowful, but your sorrow shall be turned into joy.
hmr: Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, nangni in mitthli tlâng a ta, ṭap rak bawk in ta, khawvêl ruok chu lâwm an tih, nangni lungngai in ta, nisienlakhawm, in lungngai chu lâwmin inchang a tih.

en: A woman when she is in travail hath sorrow, because her hour is come: but when she is delivered of the child, she remembereth no more the anguish, for the joy that a man is born into the world.
hmr: Nuhmeiin nauha ân vawiin a lungngai hlak, a hun a tlung ta leiin, nisienlakhawm, nau a hung nei phing chun a thlaphâng chu a hriet nâwk ta ngai nawh, khawvêla mihriem hung pieng chu a lâwm leiin.

en: And ye therefore now have sorrow: but I will see you again, and your heart shall rejoice, and your joy no one taketh away from you.
hmr: Chun, tuhin nangni in lung- ngai, nisienlakhawm, hmu nâwk ka ti cheu a, in lungril lâwm a tih, in lâwm chu tukhawmin lâkpêk naw ni hai cheu.

en: And in that day ye shall ask me no question. Verily, verily, I say unto you, If ye shall ask anything of the Father, he will give it you in my name.
hmr: Chu ni chun nangnîn kei iengkhawm mîn dawn naw ti niu. Titakzetin, titakzetin ka hril cheu hi, Pa kuomah in hni taphawt chu ka hmingin pêng a ti cheu.

en: Hitherto have ye asked nothing in my name: ask, and ye shall receive, that your joy may be made full.
hmr: Tu chen hin keia hmingin iengkhawm in la hni nawh; hni ro, chuongchun hmûng in tih, in lâwm a kimna dingin.

en: These things have I spoken unto you in dark sayings: the hour cometh, when I shall no more speak unto you in dark sayings, but shall tell you plainly of the Father.
hmr: “Chuong thu chu a thawiin in kuomah ka hril tah; a hun a tlung ding a nih, chu pha chun a thawiin in kuomah thu hril nâwk ta naw ning a, fietakin Pa chanchin hril lem ka ti cheu.

en: In that day ye shall ask in my name: and I say not unto you, that I will pray the Father for you;
hmr: Chu ni chun keia hmingin thil hnîng in ta, chun, ‘Pa kuomah keiin ngên pêk ka ti cheu,’ ka ti naw cheu a,

en: for the Father himself loveth you, because ye have loved me, and have believed that I came forth from the Father.
hmr: Pa ngeiin a hmangai si cheu a, nangnîn kei in mi hmangai a, Pathiena suok ka nih ti in ring leiin.

en: I came out from the Father, and am come into the world: again, I leave the world, and go unto the Father.
hmr: Kei Pa kuoma inthawka hung suok a, khawvêla hung ka nih; khawvêl fe san a, Pa kuoma fe nâwk ding ka nih,” a ta.

en: His disciples say, Lo, now speakest thou plainly, and speakest no dark saying.
hmr: A închûktirhaiin, “Ngai ta, tuhin chu fietakin thu i hril a, a thawi hrim hrimin i hril ta naw hi.

en: Now know we that thou knowest all things, and needest not that any man should ask thee: by this we believe that thou camest forth from God.
hmr: Nangin iengkim i hriet a, tukhawm indawn che i ngai nawh ti tuhin kan hriet tah; hi hi lei hin Pathien kuoma hung suok i ni ti kan awi ie,” an ta.

en: Jesus answered them, Do ye now believe?
hmr: Chun, Isûn a dawn a, an kuomah, “Tuhin chu in awi ta maw?

en: Behold, the hour cometh, yea, is come, that ye shall be scattered, every man to his own, and shall leave me alone: and yet I am not alone, because the Father is with me.
hmr: Ngai ro, a hun a tlung ding a ni tah, anih, a tlung zing tah, chu pha chun, mâni in sengah indar vawng in tih, keia khât chauin mi thlâthlam in tih; nisienlakhawm, Pa ka kuoma a um leiin makhât chauin ka um si nawh.

en: These things have I spoken unto you, that in me ye may have peace. In the world ye have tribulation: but be of good cheer; I have overcome the world.
hmr: Hieng thu hi in kuomah ka hril ta hi, keimaa in thlamuongna dingin. Khawvêla hin rinumin in um hlak; nisienlakhawm, thlamuong- takin um ro, keiin khawvêl ka hne tah,” a ta.
